txt.en:
'I have been tasked by Théoden King, my uncle, with gathering our people to Dunharrow for shelter from this brutal war.

'I have managed to keep as much order as possible in Edoras, but I cannot leave my people to attend to this matter. You have proven yourself a hardy [placeholder], and I would entrust you with this task should you seek to aid me.

'Far to the north of Edoras, the trading village of Middlemead lies nestled amongst the trees. Gather the people and have them seek shelter here while we make ready to travel south.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest will fail if you complete 'Trading Fates' before speaking to Thane Mágla.</rgb>

Éowyn has asked for your aid in rallying the people of Middlemead to Edoras as Thane Mágla has not sent word.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest will fail if you complete 'Trading Fates' before speaking to Thane Mágla.</rgb>
'Traveller, you bear tidings of Edoras? Very well then... let us speak.'

Thane Mágla can be found in the Mead Hall of Middlemead in north-western Kingstead.\n\nÉowyn, acting as steward of Edoras, has asked you to aid in gathering the people of Middlemead in preparation for the journey to Dunharrow.
Talk to Thane Mágla in Middlemead
